name: fictionally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an imaginary way or one related to fiction (= writing about imaginary events): The TV series fictionally dramatizes the work of a team of FBI agents. You could call it her fictionally adopted country as all her novels are set there.
More examplesFewer examplesThese are the sorts of subjects that I can only deal with fictionally as they are just too upsetting otherwise.There are references to living people and real places and events, but they are all used fictionally.The subject is fictionally rich material for crime writers.The film fictionally portrays the real-life events that took place in the city in 1968.
